page.title: 04THE NURSERY AT GRT PLUMSTEAD
page.content: Our area being mostly agricultural has several farms and{nurseries}some of which we visited.One nursery belonges to E.W. Jones of Smee lane,Gt. Plumstead.They own 90 acres of land ,most of which is covered with{mustard ,wheat or barley.The land is medium and is quite good.They have several greenhouses and grow carnations ,roses ,spring flowers ,tomatoes and lettuces.Where possible they grow their crops from seed.They sell the {flowers}locally at Norwich market or in London.The mustard goes to{Colmans and the{corn}to Dalgetys.12 people are employed here and the farm/nursery has its own water system.
